languages.text: {n}Друкари медлит. Потом подходит к вам и проводит когтем по вашей щеке. Его голос, еще минуту назад дрожавший от раздражения, становится пряным медом.{/n} "Но когда ты будешь готов{mf||а} к новой прогулке... ты знаешь, где меня найти".

{n}He pauses, then strides over to you and drags a claw along your cheek. His voice, which just a moment ago was vibrating with irritation, is now as smooth as spiced honey.{/n} "But when you are ready for another walk... you know where to find me."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари медлит. Потом подходит к вам и проводит когтем по вашей щеке. Его голос, еще минуту назад дрожавший от раздражения, становится пряным медом.{/n} "Но когда ты будешь готов{mf||а} к новой прогулке... ты знаешь, где меня найти".

traits.locale_text: {n}He pauses, then strides over to you and drags a claw along your cheek. His voice, which just a moment ago was vibrating with irritation, is now as smooth as spiced honey.{/n} "But when you are ready for another walk... you know where to find me."

{n}He pauses, then strides over to you and drags a claw along your cheek. His voice, which just a moment ago was vibrating with irritation, is now as smooth as spiced honey.{/n} "But when you are ready for another walk... you know where to find me."

{n}He pauses, then strides over to you and drags a claw along your cheek. His voice, which just a moment ago was vibrating with irritation, is now as smooth as spiced honey.{/n} "But when you are ready for another walk... you know where to find me."

{n}He pauses, then strides over to you and drags a claw along your cheek. His voice, which just a moment ago was vibrating with irritation, is now as smooth as spiced honey.{/n} "But when you are ready for another walk... you know where to find me."

languages.text: {n}他顿了顿，随后大步朝你走来，利爪从你的脸颊上滑过。他的声音刚刚还恼怒不已，现在却仿佛加了香料的蜂蜜一样丝滑。{/n}“不过，如果你打算再次享受盛宴的话……你知道该去哪里找我。”
languages.original_text: {n}He pauses, then strides over to you and drags a claw along your cheek. His voice, which just a moment ago was vibrating with irritation, is now as smooth as spiced honey.{/n} "But when you are ready for another walk... you know where to find me."

traits.locale_text: {n}他顿了顿，随后大步朝你走来，利爪从你的脸颊上滑过。他的声音刚刚还恼怒不已，现在却仿佛加了香料的蜂蜜一样丝滑。{/n}“不过，如果你打算再次享受盛宴的话……你知道该去哪里找我。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは立ち止まると、こちらにズカズカ歩み寄り、頬に爪を這わせた。ついさっきまで苛立ちで震えていた彼の声は、ピリッとする蜂蜜のように滑らかな声に変わっていた。{/n}「じゃあ、また散歩する気持ちになったら…どこに俺がいるか分かるな」
languages.original_text: {n}He pauses, then strides over to you and drags a claw along your cheek. His voice, which just a moment ago was vibrating with irritation, is now as smooth as spiced honey.{/n} "But when you are ready for another walk... you know where to find me."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは立ち止まると、こちらにズカズカ歩み寄り、頬に爪を這わせた。ついさっきまで苛立ちで震えていた彼の声は、ピリッとする蜂蜜のように滑らかな声に変わっていた。{/n}「じゃあ、また散歩する気持ちになったら…どこに俺がいるか分かるな」

languages.text: {n}Hace una pausa, luego se acerca a ti y te pasa un dedo afilado por la mejilla. Su voz, que hace un momento temblaba de irritación, es ahora tan dulce como la miel especiada.{/n} «Pero cuando estés {mf|listo|lista} para otro paseo... ya sabes dónde encontrarme».
languages.original_text: {n}He pauses, then strides over to you and drags a claw along your cheek. His voice, which just a moment ago was vibrating with irritation, is now as smooth as spiced honey.{/n} "But when you are ready for another walk... you know where to find me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hace una pausa, luego se acerca a ti y te pasa un dedo afilado por la mejilla. Su voz, que hace un momento temblaba de irritación, es ahora tan dulce como la miel especiada.{/n} «Pero cuando estés {mf|listo|lista} para otro paseo... ya sabes dónde encontrarme».

languages.text: {n}Il s'interrompt et s'approche de vous avant d'effleurer lentement votre joue d'une griffe acérée. Sa voix, qui un instant plus tôt frémissait d'irritation contenue, se fait subitement aussi douce que le miel.{/n} « Mais quand vous serez {mf|prêt|prête} pour une autre escapade, vous savez où me trouver. »
languages.original_text: {n}He pauses, then strides over to you and drags a claw along your cheek. His voice, which just a moment ago was vibrating with irritation, is now as smooth as spiced honey.{/n} "But when you are ready for another walk... you know where to find me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il s'interrompt et s'approche de vous avant d'effleurer lentement votre joue d'une griffe acérée. Sa voix, qui un instant plus tôt frémissait d'irritation contenue, se fait subitement aussi douce que le miel.{/n} « Mais quand vous serez {mf|prêt|prête} pour une autre escapade, vous savez où me trouver. »

languages.text: {n}Er hält inne, tritt dann zu dir herüber und fährt dir mit einer Klaue über die Wange. Seine Stimme, die eben noch offenbarte, wie verärgert er war, erklingt auf einmal so sanft wie süßer Honig.{/n} "Aber solltet Ihr bereit sein für einen Spaziergang ... Ihr wisst, wo Ihr mich findet."
languages.original_text: {n}He pauses, then strides over to you and drags a claw along your cheek. His voice, which just a moment ago was vibrating with irritation, is now as smooth as spiced honey.{/n} "But when you are ready for another walk... you know where to find me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er hält inne, tritt dann zu dir herüber und fährt dir mit einer Klaue über die Wange. Seine Stimme, die eben noch offenbarte, wie verärgert er war, erklingt auf einmal so sanft wie süßer Honig.{/n} "Aber solltet Ihr bereit sein für einen Spaziergang ... Ihr wisst, wo Ihr mich findet."

languages.text: {n}Duraksıyor, ardından bir adımda yanında biterek tek bir pençesini yanağında gezdiriyor. Bir dakika önce öfkeyle titreyen sesi, şimdi baharatlı bal kadar yumuşak geliyor.{/n} "Ancak başka bir yürüyüşe hazır olduğunda... Beni nerede bulacağını biliyorsun."
languages.original_text: {n}He pauses, then strides over to you and drags a claw along your cheek. His voice, which just a moment ago was vibrating with irritation, is now as smooth as spiced honey.{/n} "But when you are ready for another walk... you know where to find me."
